This chest is used in the Theatre of Blood and are accessible after the Pestilent Bloat and Sotetseg have been killed. It supplies players with different supplies provided by entertained vampyres, purchasable with points earned in the Theatre.

These supplies can be purchased with points, which depending on the player's performance, can range from 6 to 13.

Item Points
Stamina potion(4)[c 1] 1
Prayer potion(4) 2
Saradomin brew(4) 3
Super restore(4) 3
Mushroom potato 1
Shark 1
Sea turtle 2
Manta ray 2
Message[c 2] 0
Onion[c 3] 0
Bandages[c 4] 0
  1. ^ Only one is purchasable per chest.
  2. ^ Message given depends on performance.
  3. ^ Given in place of all other rewards if the player dies at Pestilent Bloat or Sotetseg.
  4. ^ 10 are given only in entry mode.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
3 June 2021
(update)
  • When using mid-raid chests, you can select from previous quantities of a particular item you have bought, rather than inputting the number every time.
  • Players can now only buy one stamina potion from mid-level chests. This is to discourage players from obtaining an excessive amount of stamina potions.
